typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturationAC
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PLATEFORMES
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturationAP
source(output(
		Article as string,
		Distributeur as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string,
		{Mois début} as string,
		{Mois fin} as string,
		mois1 as string,
		annee1 as string,
		mois2 as string,
		annee2 as string,
		dd as string,
		month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> prixParPeriode
AllFacturation derive(year = toString(year({Jour calendaire})),
		yearmonth = iif(month({Jour calendaire})<10, toString(year({Jour calendaire}))+"0"+toString(month({Jour calendaire})), toString(year({Jour calendaire}))+toString(month({Jour calendaire}))),
		date_id = toString({Jour calendaire}, "dd-MM-yyyy"),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> extractYearMonth
extractYearMonth derive(fact_filter = iif ( ({Type de facture} =='YFAR' && ({Motif commande}=='FAS')  ||  ( {Type de facture}=='YFAB' && {Motif commande}=='FAS' )) ,1,0)) ~> FactFilterc
FactFilterc derive(qt_cd_e = {Qté cdée},
		ca_cd_ = {CA cdé},
		qt_livr_e = {Qté livrée},
		ca_livr_ = {CA livré},
		qt_factur_e = {Qté facturée},
		ca_factur_ = {CA facturé},
		cout_standard_cd_ = {Cout standard cdé},
		cout_fabrication = {Cout fabrication},
		cout_standard_livr_ = {Cout standard livré},
		cout_standard_factur_ = {Cout standard facturé}) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn derive(year_month = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthc
extractYearMonthc filter(fact_filter==0 && !isNull(Article)) ~> FactFilter
PLATEFORMES filter(instr(WholeSalerID, 'DSC')> 0  ||instr(WholeSalerID, 'TEREVA')> 0) ~> filtreDSC
renameColumns, filtreDSC join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerDSC
PLATEFORMES filter(instr(WholeSalerID, 'DSC')== 0  &&  instr(WholeSalerID, 'TEREVA')== 0) ~> filtreOtherPlateforme
renameColumns, filtreOtherPlateforme join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerPlateforme
FactFilter select(mapColumn(
		{ Org. commerciale} = {Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{1ereDateLivrDdee},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{ vente} = {Type doc. vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		date_id,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		fact_filter,
		qt_cd_e,
		ca_cd_,
		qt_livr_e,
		ca_livr_,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		cout_standard_cd_,
		cout_fabrication,
		cout_standard_livr_,
		cout_standard_factur_,
		year_month,
		reference = Article
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameColumns
renameColumns, PLATEFORMES join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftPlateforme
leftPlateforme filter(isNull( HubSAPid )) ~> hubsapidNULL
innerDSC select(mapColumn(
		{Org commerciale} = { Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{1ereDateLivrDdee},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{recept de march} = {Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{type doc vente} = { vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		date_id,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		qt_cd_e,
		ca_cd_,
		qt_livr_e,
		ca_livr_,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		year_month,
		reference,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
InnerPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		{ Org commerciale} = { Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{1ereDateLivrDdee},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march} = {Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{Type doc vente} = { vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		date_id,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		qt_cd_e,
		ca_cd_,
		qt_livr_e,
		ca_livr_,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		year_month,
		reference,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
filter1 derive(toreplicate = abs(toInteger({Qté facturée})),
		{CA facturé} = toDouble( {CA facturé}) / toDouble( {Qté facturée})) ~> typecaste
typecaste derive(toroll = mapLoop(abs(toInteger( {Qté facturée})), #index),
		tempDist = iif(lower(WholeSalerID)=='ancs - accueil négoce chauffage sanitaire','partedis',
  iif(instr(lower(WholeSalerID), 'trva - tereva' )>0, 'tereva', 
   iif(instr(lower(WholeSalerID), 'dsc')>0, 'dsc', 
    iif(instr(lower(WholeSalerID), 'vf' )>0, 'vf_confort', 
     iif(instr(lower(WholeSalerID), 'sonac' )>0, 'sonac',
lower(WholeSalerID))))))) ~> toroll
toroll foldDown(unroll(toroll, toroll),
	mapColumn(
		{ Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		date_id,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		qt_cd_e,
		ca_cd_,
		qt_livr_e,
		ca_livr_,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		year_month,
		reference,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		toroll
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> torolltoList
torolltoList window(over(yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		reference),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(HubSAPid, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> createIndexPartedis
createIndexPartedis derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+HubSAPid+coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(reference, " ", ""))),replace(reference, " ", ""))+toString(indexcols2),
		{Qté facturée} = iif(toDouble({Qté facturée})<=0, -1, 1)) ~> newColumns
newColumns derive({CA facturé} = {Qté facturée}*abs({CA facturé})) ~> CAfacture
typecaste filter(isNull({Qté facturée})) ~> quantityNULL
quantityNULL derive({CA facturé} = toDouble(ca_factur_),
		indexcols2 = yearmonth+HubSAPid+reference+"null",
		{Qté facturée} = toInteger({Qté facturée})) ~> qteNullFacturaction
CAfacture, qteNullFacturaction union(byName: true)~> UnionQteNullFacturation
facturationAC, facturationAP union(byName: true)~> AllFacturation
extractYearMonthc select(mapColumn(
		{Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{1ereDateLivrDdee},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		Article,
		{Type doc. vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		Prop_0,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		date_id,
		fact_filter,
		qt_cd_e,
		ca_cd_,
		qt_livr_e,
		ca_livr_,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		cout_standard_cd_,
		cout_fabrication,
		cout_standard_livr_,
		cout_standard_factur_,
		year_month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
select1, PLATEFORMES join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
join1 select(mapColumn(
		{Org commerciale} = {Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{1ereDateLivrDdee},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		Article,
		{ vente} = {Type doc. vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		Prop_0,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		date_id,
		fact_filter,
		qt_cd_e,
		ca_cd_,
		qt_livr_e,
		ca_livr_,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		cout_standard_cd_,
		cout_fabrication,
		cout_standard_livr_,
		cout_standard_factur_,
		year_month,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
rename filter(toString(HubSAPid)!="16004028") ~> filter1
hubsapidNULL derive(yearmonth = yearmonth,
		Article = reference,
		{Code client} = {Récept. de march.},
		{Qté vente directe} = {Qté facturée}) ~> mapColName
periode select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		{Période},
		annee2,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoicePrix
UnionQteNullFacturation select(mapColumn(
		{ Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		date_id,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		qt_cd_e,
		ca_cd_,
		qt_livr_e,
		ca_livr_,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		year_month,
		reference,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		toroll,
		indexcols2,
		{1ereDateLivrDdee}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> keepPeriode
prixParPeriode derive({Période} = iif(length({Période})>1,{Période},"0"+{Période})) ~> periode
derivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(reference),
	Nombre = count(reference),
		CA = sum({CA facturé}),
		{Qté} = sum({Qté facturée})) ~> aggregate1
keepPeriode filter(replace(year, " ", "")=="2021"  && WholeSalerID=="VFC - VF CONFORT") ~> filter2
filter2 derive(reference = coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(reference, " ", ""))),replace(reference, " ", ""))) ~> derivedColumn1
dropColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['AZ_facturationDescTEREVA.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> facturationForDSCTEREVA
typecaste sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Org_commerciale as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Ann�e civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{CA cd�} as string,
		{Qt� livr�e} as string,
		{CA livr�} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		{Cout standard cd�} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livr�} as string,
		{Cout standard factur�} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		{P�riode} as string,
		Offre as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		data_origin as string,
		{Ecoulement origin} as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{ATC performance} as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['facturationForOther.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> facturationForOtherPlateform
filtreOtherPlateforme sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
